Configuration.Name: L1=12m_L2=1p3m 8A offset
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 8 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 33.24 config.beamcenterz = 94.29
config.drive()
